capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry's forehead is looking pretty rough. He's got this weird lightning-shaped cut on it - I've never seen anything like it before. It's really concerning, to be honest.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Harry belongs to a gray mouse. That's quite an interesting fact about him. I'm certain it's true, and I think it's kind of cool that he has such a unique companion.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of a gray mouse before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Ron's belongings are indeed a gray mouse. I'm quite certain about that, and I'd say it's a fairly neutral situation - not particularly exciting or surprising. It seems like a pretty ordinary thing to happen.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of ron before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Ron is 11 years old. I've known him since he was a kid, and I can confirm that's his current age.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never met anyone that young before, valeria, tell me more about yourself!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that I can confirm with confidence.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of enchantment does ron cast?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him on this one, I've seen Hagrid around Hogwarts and he definitely seems like a grown man to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of you before, valeria, but i'm so excited to learn more about hagrid   who is he?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid does look pretty tall for a half-giant, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him towering over the rest of us in the Great Hall. It's quite impressive, actually.
